    • Constructor Detail

      • Square

        public Square(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String color,
              boolean isFilled,
              double length,
              double width)
        Constructor. Both sides must equal eachother.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the square.
        color - Color of the square.
        isFilled - Whether or not the square is filled with the color or not.
        length - Length of the square.
        width - Width of the square.
